Love Island's Paige Thorne has revealed that she will be returning to her job as a paramedic following her time on the ITV2 show.

articles.title: Nicola Peltz parties with husband Brooklyn Beckham following PDA at Variety event - Daily Mail
articles.description: Brooklyn Peltz Beckham and Nicola Peltz Beckham couldn't keep their hands  off each other as they locked lips at the Variety Power of Young Hollywood Event in Hollywood on Thursday.
